divs: sighting detailsi was driving towards las vegas and passing through boulder city at 5:30pm on sun. 1\20\08 when ahead of me in the sky, my attention was drawn to three elongated clouds. they appeared dark brown at dusk. on the cloud to the left i saw a very long dark thick stick [cigar]looking object that was coming down out of the cloud. i realized that i was looking at some unusual and was excited. i stopped the car and grabbed my binoculars, but when i looked at the cloud again the object was gone. i kept scanning the clouds and suddenly saw what i believed to be another object of the same description above the same cloud and to the left. it went through the cloud and came though the bottom and just disappeared in place in about a second. the object didn't loose its shape or change in size, it just vanished!
Summary: Cigar Shaped Object coming down out of a cloud.
